virtual-sensor.name: Saastal_Dozer_WgpsStatus__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerWgpsStatusMsg) from Saastal deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, SENSORTYPE, SENSORTYPE_SERIALID, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, cast(round(PAYLOAD_GPS_VOLTAGE * (1.5/4096.0) * (57.0/24.0), 3) as CHAR(30)) as GPS_VOLTAGE, cast(round(PAYLOAD_GPS_CURRENT * (1.5/4096.0) * (10.0/0.15), 3) as CHAR(30)) as GPS_CURRENT, cast(round(PAYLOAD_SAM7_CURRENT * (1.5/4096.0) * (10.0/0.15), 3) as CHAR(30)) as SAM7_CURRENT, cast(round(PAYLOAD_TN_PER_CURRENT * (1.5/4096.0) * (10.0/0.15), 3) as CHAR(30)) as TN_PER_CURRENT, PAYLOAD_SAM7_POWER as SAM7_POWER, PAYLOAD_SAM7_VALID as SAM7_VALID, cast(round(ASIN(PAYLOAD_INCLINOMETER_X / 32000.0) * 180.0/PI(), 3) as CHAR(30)) as INCLINOMETER_X, cast(round(ASIN(PAYLOAD_INCLINOMETER_Y / 32000.0) * 180.0/PI(), 3) as CHAR(30)) as INCLINOMETER_Y, PAYLOAD_SAM7_UNIXTIME*1000 as SAM7_UNIXTIME, PAYLOAD_GPS_SV_QUEUE as GPS_SV_QUEUE from wrapper
